Entries.default:
"Eccosi. You have business here?"

The guard holds up a hand, appraising you in a few sweeping glances.
"I've just come from Port Maje. Governor Clario suggested I might find work here."
"You are in luck. The governor is between meetings. Go on in."
"Welcome back. Governor Alvari will see you."
"Keep the hall clear, please. This is a place of business."
"I'd like to speak with the governor."

"Governor Lueva Alvari. Governor Alvari manages the Company's day-to-day operations. As you can imagine, this makes her a very busy woman." 

The guard eyes you pointedly.
